info.title: KTH Updates and Deployments API
info.description: RestAPI with information about all uppdates and deployments that happen in KTH:s production environments.

get.summary: GET a test endpoint that is protected by api key to validate that consumer has a proper api key
Gets the latest deployment for an application in a given cluster name (active, stage, integral) or 'production'.
get.description: When an applicatioon is deployed, we store information about that event according to https://app.kth.se/jsonschema/dizin/deployment. You can retrive this information for an application name.

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: Cluster name to get current deployments from (i.e: active, stage)

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: Application name to get current deployments from (i.e: niskeko-web, search-api)

get.summary: Gets the last deployment information for applications deployed in a cluster.
get.description: Gets the last deployment information for applications deployed in a cluster (ex 'active', 'stage', 'integral') or in production (ex 'production').

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: Cluster name to get current deployments from (i.e: active, stage)

post.summary: Add a new application deployment for a cluster.
post.description: Add a new application deployment according to https://app.kth.se/jsonschema/dizin/deployment. Also see ex https://github.com/KTH/flottsbro-api/blob/master/curl-POST.sh

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: Cluster name to get current deployments from (i.e: active, stage)

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.description: Application name to get current deployments from (i.e: niskeko-web, search-api)

get.summary: Search for starting with a path.
get.description: Searches for deployments matching a URL encoded path. Ex:  curl -s -S --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'api_key: abcd' 'https://api.kth.se/api/pipeline/v1/search/active/%2Fkth-azure-app%2F' and returnes the first match.

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: Cluster name to search in  (ex: active, stage)

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: URL encoded path. curl -s -S --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'api_key: abcd' 'https://api.kth.se/api/pipeline/v1/search/active/%2Fkth-azure-app%2F' and returnes the first match.

get.summary: Gets the latest deployment matching a URL encoded monitor url.
get.description: Gets the latest deployment matching a URL encoded monitor url. curl -s -S --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'api_key: abcd' 'https://api.kth.se/api/pipeline/v1/monitor/active/https%3A%2F%2Fapp.kth.se%2Fkopps%2F_monitor_core'

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: Cluster name to get current deployments from (i.e: active, stage)

parameters.name: monitorUrl
parameters.description: An absolute url that is URL encoded. Ex: 'https%3A%2F%2Fapp.kth.se%2Fkopps%2F_monitor_core'

id.description: Unique identifier representing some specific data
